title: 150W GaN Charger PD3.0 PPS USB-C Charger
description: Powered up by GaN Tech, 4 Ports(2*USB-C+2*USB-A), C port max output is PD3.0 PPS 100W, can charge many USB-C laptops, 150W total support charge 4 devices simultaneously, A Ports is QC3.0 22.5W, this charger is compatible with all USB devices.
